<br>

I am Waleed Ali, a Lecturer in the Department of Mathematical Sciences in the University of Bath since 2017.  I am an applied mathematician, with a PhD in *Hydrodynamic Stability Theory* from Cardiff University under the supervision of Dr Christopher Davies.

Currently, my academic and research interests lie in Mathematics Pedagogy and Educational Practices, Interdisciplinary Education and Effective Teaching Practices.

I am a part of the Mathematics Education [PRiME](https://prime-bath.github.io/PRiME/) group in Bath where we focus our efforts on disseminating effective teaching practices and ways of making students in higher education more engaged in their learning journey.

<br>

## Research Interests

### Edcuational

+ Mathematics pedagogy
+ Effective teaching practices using appropriate technologies
+ Interdisciplinary teaching practices

### Fluid Dynamics

+ Hydrodynamic stability theory
+ Turbulence suppression

## Administrative Roles in the Univeristy of Bath

- **Outreach & Widening Participation Officer**:  I run the Maths Department's outreach team where we give talks, run workshops and activities in Science Festivals or local state schools.  If you have any queries, contact me or [Maths Outreach](mailto: maths-outreach@bath.ac.uk).

- **HEA Champion**:  I am the HEA representative of the Maths Department responsible for mentoring and advising Maths staff and PG students wishing to apply for HEA fellowship as well as being an HEA reviewer.

- **[Peer Mentoring](https://www.thesubath.com/peer-support/mentoring/) Coordinator**:  I run the Maths department's peer mentoring scheme where Y2 and Y3 students are matched up with the incoming Y1 students to help advise them and act as a point of contact.

- **[Discover Bath](https://www.bath.ac.uk/campaigns/discover-bath/) Coordinator**:  Every year, the department hosts students from across the country where we run a 3-day maths workshop, helping to inspire students to pursue maths as an educational path in their future.

- **Convener of Mathematics for Natural Sciences**:  In my interdepartmental role, I have been assigned as the convener for all the maths units taught in the Department of Natural Sciences.
